definition: Qi Baishi (1864-1957), famous Chinese painter

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: He has a painting by Qibaishi.
sentences.chinese: 他藏有齊白石的一幅畫兒。

sentences.english: The fifth part is the paintings of flowers, birds, grass, insects.
" Qi Baishi's "ground" and "thinking" in this view, an unrivaled.
sentences.chinese: 齊白石的“勤”和“思”，在今天看來，無人可比。

sentences.english: They gave pride of place at the exhibition to a painting by Qi Baishi.
sentences.chinese: 他們把齊白石的一幅畫陳列在畫展的最顯著的位置。

sentences.english: Qi Baishi's style of painting often leaves the audience guessing.
sentences.chinese: 齊白石的繪畫作品常讓觀賞者猜想。

sentences.english: Qi began to experiment with painting.
sentences.chinese: 齊白石開始在繪畫上作嘗試。

sentences.english: Then he changed his name as White-Stone.
sentences.chinese: 自此以後，他改名爲齊白石。
